name: The Metro
description:
The Metro is a minimalistic resource management strategy. Find supplies, gather people around and survive.

To move around map press WASD

Tips:

  1. You need tools to build new facilities.
  2. Tools and weapons can be crafted when in workshops.
  3. Assign workers to different jobs ( left top corner )

Developed by pixeye.

pixeye@hbrew.com feel free to contact me for any inquiries.
